translations.name: Welsh Bible
translations.description: This is a popular translation of the Bible in simple colloquial Welsh. It’s a completely original translation. It's not an adaptation of any other Welsh version, neither is it based on any English version. The work began as an attempt to express the message of the New Testament in simple spoken Welsh, but very soon there was a call for a similar version of the Old Testament. There were two target groups of readers in mind – young people (especially those without a church background) and people that have learnt Welsh as a second language.The New Testament was first published on http://www.beibl.net in 2002, and the entire Bible was launched on the website on March 1st, 2013.
